mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.user_id, t.title, t.views_count, t.complete_count, t.level, t.created_at, SUM(r.time) AS total_routine_time FROM timer_info t JOIN routine_info r ON r.timer_info_id = t.id GROUP BY t.id;
SELECT timer_info_id, health_category_id FROM timer_category WHERE timer_info_id = #{id};
SELECT id, timer_info_id, name, time, is_rest FROM routine_info WHERE timer_info_id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timer_info (user_id, title, level) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{level});

INSERT IGNORE INTO timer_category (timer_info_id, health_category_id) VALUES
(#{category.timerInfoId}, #{category.healthCategoryId})

INSERT INTO routine_info (timer_info_id, name, time, is_rest) VALUES
(#{routine.timerInfoId}, #{routine.name}, #{routine.time}, #{routine.isRest})
INSERT INTO routine_info (timer_info_id, name, time, is_rest) VALUES (#{timerInfoId}, #{name}, #{time}, #{isRest});
